name: Angry Cat
description:
Angry Cat will involve you in a tense and fun adventure. Test your reflexes, strategies, motor skills with each challenge to complete and win the challenges if you can!

You will use the mouse and keyboard to control each of the cats facing puzzles, dangerous enemies, and various traps. Help the kitty couple along the paths to victory in over 20 unique and challenging levels.











 
  
   
MADE WITH LOVE ❤️
